"datenschutz ist menschenrecht! wie kann es sein, dass unternehmen immer noch unsere daten sammeln und verkaufen, ohne unsere einwilligung? #datenschutz #privatsph√§re" 

translation:
"data protection is a human right! how can it be that companies are still collecting and selling our data without our consent? #dataprotection #privacy"

note: as a german native speaker, i've used the hashtags in english, as they are commonly used on twitter, but the post itself is written in german.
